attributes.action: make ministers acountable in the courts for their decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in view of the events of recent years. bad government has lead us into wars based on lies and the collapse of our banking system. all this has come at a huge cost in terms of life and jobs for people round the world. yet the people who made these decisions have got away without any penalty and still enjoy a life of luxury and privelage. this must change and i hope this petition is one step to help bring this about

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
